HydrationTracker Hello blank fragment //Location Current Location Get Location //Weather It will be normal weather today,so your daily requirement stays the same It will be warm weather today,so your daily requirement has been increased //(home_screen) Drunk It 250ml 500ml 750ml 1L Drink Drunk //(top_left_drawer_menu_home_screen) Day Tracking Week Tracking Month Tracking Info Open Navigation Drawer Close Navigation Drawer //(bottom_nav_menu_home_screen) User Progress Home HydrationTracker
//(main_activity) HYDRATION-TRACKER Nickname Password LogIn Register //(wasserbedarf) No worries, you can change your water demand afterwards! Back to LogIn //(useract_daten) Your Hydration Account: Change your data Back to Menu //(registrierung) Create User: Age: Bodyheight (cm): Gender: Male Female Others Select Profile Picture Finish registration //(editUser) Change User Data: Water Demand (ml) Change Profile Picture Save Changes +250ml +500ml +1000ml
